title: Does ktransformers support deepseek V2.5？
author: huliangbing

comments.body: Yes～you can run v2.5 with deepseekv2‘s yaml.

satisfaction_conditions: Confirmation of compatibility between ktransformers and deepseek V2.5

title: Suggestion to add DeepSeek v2.5 support
body: Recently DeepSeek 2.5 MoE model was released. Please consider adding a support for it. (Q5_K_M or Q4_K_M)
author: arisau

comments.body: It appears to be supported automatically, as some users have already tested it successfully.

Perfect. Thank you. 
just to confirm, only Q4_K_M works?
We have supported all Qx_km format~

satisfaction_conditions: Confirmation that the DeepSeek v2.5 MoE model is supported without requiring manual implementation
Clarification that all Qx_km quantization formats (not just Q4_K_M) are supported
Evidence of successful implementation by other users
